content: but the little unknown tales of heroism like this one that made all the difference. I was not there. But this is how I see Vietnam as an outsider looking in. Each and everyone of you that served in Vietnam, on the ground, on the seas, or in the Air have my deepest respect and thank you. My wonderful uncle included. RIP Uncle H.C.S. "http://www.cnn.com/video/#/video/us/2009/03/09/reaves.pilots.reunited.wave"

title: It wasn't the politicians, the big stories or the media...
